amendment.description: An amendment numbered 219 printed in Part B of House Report 116-461 to reduce funds made available in Division F (LHHS) by 5 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 219 printed in Part B of House Report 116-461 to reduce funds made available in Division F (LHHS) by 5 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Allen amendment (A011) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 123 - 292 (Roll no. 176).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A011) pursuant to the rule.
